medical_history.chief_complaint: Self-inflicted gunshot wound to the face.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in his usual state of health until 2 days before admission when he became upset while drinking alcohol. On the evening of the incident, shortly after midnight, a gunshot was heard, and he was found with severe facial injuries.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient was healthy, took no medications, and was allergic to penicillin. His sister had opioid-use disorder.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's father died 10 years earlier of an unspecified cause.
medical_history.social_history: The patient lived with his wife and young children, had stable employment at a construction company, owned four guns, chewed tobacco, and drank alcohol socially.
